amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit $500,000 from being used for the reconstruction of Rib Mountain in Wisconsin.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 11 printed in Part B of House Report 111-219 to prohibit $500,000 from being used for the reconstruction of Rib Mountain in Wisconsin, and reduce the amount of the appropriate section of the bill by the same amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A021) Failed by recorded vote: 105 - 329 (Roll no. 633).
